projects.title: Foodify
projects.bodyText:
- Foodify Website made in React
 - Frontend is build using Parcel, ReactJS, Redux, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind CSS, Testing done using React-Testing Library, Jest.
 - Scalable and Productionized Code

projects.title: DevTinder
projects.bodyText:
- DevTinder Website made in MERN
 -  Fully developed using NODEJS backend APIs with Express framework and MongoDB and frontend is build using Vite, ReactJS, Tailwind CSS and deployed using AWS.
 - Scalable and Productionised Code

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: React-Native-Firebase-Auth-Login&registration
projects.bodyText:
- Login and registartion mobile app using **React-Native** and **Firebase**.
 - Added User authentication and password stored in database using **Firebase**.
